content:
The PHD FHIR IG has been balloted and accepted. Where do I go from here?

I see a 'profiles' registered with FHIR but I don't see a list of accepted IG guides. Is there a home for those?
check https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/FHIR+Implementation+Guide+Process+Flow... I think you are on step D?

Okay thanks. I looked at the proposal. Looks like I need to send a request to Grahame first anyways. There were some terms in the check list I did not understand, Insight Id for example. Also, should I set the desired version number that I want in the package-list.json file?

@Grahame Grieve What do we need to do to move the accepted PHD IG guide to the registry?
I assume this is the correct set of instructions?
https://confluence.hl7.org/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=40740908
@Brian Reinhold have you submitted a publication request? After it's approved for publication by HL7 I add them to the registry as part of the publication process.

Brian Reinhold have you submitted a publication request? After it's approved for publication by HL7 I add them to the registry as part of the publication process.

@Lynn Laakso I have not. In the DoF workgroup we were trying to figure out which of the publishing procedures was correct.

Brian Reinhold said:

Brian Reinhold have you submitted a publication request? After it's approved for publication by HL7 I add them to the registry as part of the publication process.

Lynn Laakso I have not. In the DoF workgroup we were trying to figure out which of the publishing procedures was correct.

@Lynn Laakso Yes I have, some time ago in fact and I have heard nothing.
haven't seen a publication request for PHD come through.
it's not on my confluence list. did you submit a Word attachment to your steering division?
